mapper.insert: insert into p_review(num, userid, age, gender, idx, review_star, title, content, image_file) values((select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from p_review),#{userid},#{age},#{gender},#{idx},#{review_star},#{title}, #{content},#{image_file})
mapper.select: select count(*) from p_review where userid = #{userid}

select a.num, a.userid, a.age, a.gender, a.idx, a.review_star, a.title, a.content, a.review_count, a.image_file, a.reg_date, b.iname, b.picture, b.volume from p_review a full outer join p_items b on (a.idx = b.idx) where a.userid =#{userid} and (a.title like #{keyword} or a.content like #{keyword} or b.iname like #{keyword})
